plot: Melinda's father comes back into her life, and she must solve the mystery of where he's been and how it relates to a young ghost who won't cross over.

Melinda suffers strange nightmares and the masked ghost of her father, whose presumed death she doubts again. So she welcomes the case of pre-teen boy ghost Michael Wilkins, son of a victim of Paul Eastman, the vicious fiend who escaped from jail in a fire, who her dad failed to dispose of, as an angel to his fate. Then dad turns up at brother Gabriel's, but she soon realizes that too may be a case of two bodies-possession.—KGF Vissers
